channel.title: July Report: 49,112 Page Visits, 5,242 Email Subscribers and $435,79
channel.description:
Hey! I am Rich, maker of [Failory](https://www.failory.com). A few months ago we became a transparent startup and became sharing our marketing strategies, numbers, revenue & expenses. Some weeks ago I shared my June report [in this community](http://discuss.bootstrapped.fm/t/june-report-67-657-page-views-4-992-email-subscribers-and-36-76/5920). Today, I have just published our July report.
July was a pretty successful month. +12K users visited the website, 250 of which subscribed to Failory newsletter. The SEO traffic grew a lot, and +50% of the traffic represented organic searches. I was also able to sell some sponsorships, so I made +$400. Moreover, I launched a few new pages on the site and carry out some design improvements. You can read the article here:
 
https://www.failory.com/open/july-2018
 
But in case you don't have time to read this long article, here is the most important information ğŸ‘‡
Our **Google Analytics** numbers:
* ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘§â€ğŸ‘¦ Users: 12,262 * ğŸ™‡â€â™‚ï¸ New Users: 11,129 * ğŸ–±ï¸ Sessions: 15,918 * ğŸ”¢ Number of Sessions per User: 1.30 * ğŸ‘€ Page Views: 49,112 * ğŸ¯ Pages/Session: 3.09 * â° Avg. Session Duration: 00:02:39
 
The 12,262 came from **different channels**:
* ğŸ” Organic Search: 6,525 (53.21%) * ğŸ”— Direct: 3,278 (26.73%) * ğŸ‘¬ Social: 1,489 (12.14%) * ğŸ“ Referral: 882 (7.19%) * âš™ï¸ Other: 110 (0.90%) * âœ‰ï¸ Email: 11 (0.09%)
 
Regarding our **email newsletter**, here are some numbers:
* ğŸ“© Email Subscribers in June: 4,992 * ğŸ“ˆ Email Subscribers in July: 5,242 * ğŸ†• New Subscribers: 250 * ğŸ“Š Growth Rate: 5.01% * ğŸ“… New Email Subscribers per Day: 8.06
 
What about **revenue and expenses**?
ğŸ’° Revenue: $435,79
- Sponsorships: 200$ - Ads: 135$ - Amazon Affiliates: $10,79 - Other: 90$
ğŸ’³ Expenses: $130
- Webflow Hosting: $20 - Freelancer: 50$ - Fees: $60
ğŸ’² Profit: $305.79
 
Make sure to check out our monthly report, in which you will also find the marketing strategies that allowed us to reach these numbers!
https://www.failory.com/open/july-2018

item.title: July Report: 49,112 Page Visits, 5,242 Email Subscribers and $435,79
item.dc:creator: richclominson
item.description:
Hey! I am Rich, maker of Failory. A few months ago we became a transparent startup and became sharing our marketing strategies, numbers, revenue & expenses. Some weeks ago I shared my June report in this community. Today, I have just published our July report.

July was a pretty successful month. +12K users visited the website, 250 of which subscribed to Failory newsletter. The SEO traffic grew a lot, and +50% of the traffic represented organic searches. I was also able to sell some sponsorships, so I made +$400. Moreover, I launched a few new pages on the site and carry out some design improvements. You can read the article here:

Â 

failory.com

July Report: 49,112 Page Visits, 5,242 Email Subscribers and $435,79

July was a pretty successful month. +12K users visited the website, 250 of which subscribed to Failory newsletter. The SEO traffic grew a lot, and +50% of the traffic represented organic searches. I was also able to sell some sponsorships, so I made...

Â 

But in case you donâ€™t have time to read this long article, here is the most important information

Our Google Analytics numbers:

  • Users: 12,262
  • â€â™‚ï¸ New Users: 11,129
  • ï¸ Sessions: 15,918
  • Number of Sessions per User: 1.30
  • Page Views: 49,112
  • Pages/Session: 3.09
  • Avg. Session Duration: 00:02:39

Â 

The 12,262 came from different channels:

  • Organic Search: 6,525 (53.21%)
  • Direct: 3,278 (26.73%)
  • Social: 1,489 (12.14%)
  • Referral: 882 (7.19%)
  • ï¸ Other: 110 (0.90%)
  • ï¸ Email: 11 (0.09%)

Â 

Regarding our email newsletter, here are some numbers:

  • Email Subscribers in June: 4,992
  • Email Subscribers in July: 5,242
  • New Subscribers: 250
  • Growth Rate: 5.01%
  • New Email Subscribers per Day: 8.06

Â 

What about revenue and expenses?

Revenue: $435,79

  • Sponsorships: 200$
  • Ads: 135$
  • Amazon Affiliates: $10,79
  • Other: 90$

Expenses: $130

  • Webflow Hosting: $20
  • Freelancer: 50$
  • Fees: $60

Profit: $305.79

Â 

Make sure to check out our monthly report, in which you will also find the marketing strategies that allowed us to reach these numbers!
